text: "I'll Tumble 4 Ya" is a 1983 song by English new wave Culture Club and is the fifth and final single from their debut studio album Kissing to Be Clever. It was only released in North America and went to both number 1 in the United States and Canada. ==Track listing== ;Canada 7" vinyl # A. "I'll Tumble 4 Ya" – 2:32 # B. "Man Shake" – 2:34 ;USA 7" vinyl # A. "I'll Tumble 4 Ya" – 2:32 # B. "Mystery Boy" ;USA 12" vinyl # A. "I'll Tumble 4 Ya" (12") – 4:38 # B. "Man Shake" – 2:34 ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Culture Club songs
title: I'll Tumble 4 Ya
